reviewText:
This video runs 20 minutes and shows Nord in clips from Nord Motor Company car commercials
along with getting a loan for $3000 to buy food for the week at Jerry`s New Market grocery store,
drinking (rootbeer) at Jukebox Saturday Night and finally
clips from a match against Boris Zhukov at the Met Sport Center.
It was filmed in 1987 and released Independently, no AWA association.
Indeed a rare find as to the locally Independent distribution.
I grew up with many of the AWA wrestlers in Minnesota
and John was a later addition to the AWA but an excellent one.
Thanks John for the memories.
